pinyin: ti2 shang4 yi4 shi4 ri4 cheng2

sentences.english: The routine proceeding organ of Guangxi Lawyers Association is the chairmen's meeting.
sentences.chinese: 广西律师协会日常的议事机构是会长办公会。

sentences.english: In the court, the ministries discussed the case by varying opinions.
sentences.chinese: 议事厅里大家七嘴八舌地继续讨论这个案子。

sentences.english: Inside the gate is the Xiangtang Hall, where family members commemorate the ancestors or hold meetings.
sentences.chinese: 穿过门厅就是“享堂”，是族人祭祖议事的地方。

sentences.english: and (6) To exercise other powers and functions as prescribed in the rules of procedure of the Legislative Council.
sentences.chinese: 立法会议事规则所规定的其他职权。

sentences.english: They even emended the royal journals to remove his name.
sentences.chinese: 他们甚至修改了皇家议事录，取消了他的名字。

sentences.english: Put this item on our daily work schedule.
sentences.chinese: 把这项工作提到议事日程上来。

sentences.english: Before the Chamber, in the banquet hall, offering the hall at the back.
sentences.chinese: 前为议事厅，中是宴会厅，祭把厅在后面。

sentences.english: The filibuster is an incomprehensible device of government.
sentences.chinese: 作为一种政府的手段，阻挠议事的行动非常难以理解。

sentences.english: I claim that technology has its own agenda.
sentences.chinese: 我认为技术有其自己的议事日程。

sentences.english: So let the council swear publicly.
sentences.chinese: 那就让贵族议事会公开宣誓。

sentences.english: The decurions of every town had to scrape together gold which was presented originally in the form of crowns (aurum coronarium).
sentences.chinese: 每座城市的议事会长收集原先要做成王冠形的黄金。

sentences.english: The chairman told her that she was out of order.
sentences.chinese: 主席告诉她说她已违反了议事规则。

sentences.english: In ancient times, it was a town hall where important matters were handled.
sentences.chinese: 在古代，它可是个处理大事情的议事厅。

sentences.english: I want my disagreement to be minuted.
sentences.chinese: 我希望把我的看法记入议事录。

sentences.english: Among the ordinary duties of the Council was that of receiving deputations from the provinces.
sentences.chinese: 在议事会的日常任务中包括接待外省代表。

sentences.english: The push to stimulate the economy, many say, has undercut the environmental agenda.
sentences.chinese: 很多人说，经济刺激的推进延宕了环保的议事进程。

definition: call in (one's subordinates)/summon (an envoy of a foreign country) to an interview
to have an audience (with the Emperor)
aids and advisors of top officials
reception pavilion (generally part of a large residence, and often built in a garden)
to receive sb/to grant an interview
